summary: An ordinance relating to damages to certain real property alleged to have been occasioned by the Jackson Street regrade; providing for the execution of a release of all damages and the execution of a warranty deed conveying said property to the City; appropriating Five Thousand, Five Hundred Forty-two and 50/100 Dollars ($5,542.50) from the General Fund therefor, and (such purpose not having been specified in any tax levy or official estimate) declaring the emergency making necessary such appropriation.
